item.title: GoldenDict++ Reading Mode
item.description:
[GoldenDict,OCR,macOS,Windows,eBook,取词,划词翻译,电子书,阅读器]
Read eBooks with GoldenDict++ for an immersive reading experience with easy access to unfamiliar words while reading.

item.title: GoldenDict++ Group By Folder or Formats
item.description:

Group dictionaries by root-dir or dictionary-formats, GoldenDict++

item.title: GoldenDict++按目录/格式自动分组
item.description:

item.title: GoldenDict++阅读模式
item.description:
[GoldenDict,OCR,macOS,取词,划词翻译,电子书,阅读器]
使用GoldenDict++划词翻译阅读电子书,在阅读的同时可以很方便的查询陌生词汇,沉浸式阅读体验
